meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like a fish in smell, taste, or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The fishiness of the seafood market was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: I could smell the fishiness of the ocean as soon as we arrived.
meanings.sent3: The fishiness of the sushi made me wonder if it was fresh.
meanings.sent4: The fishiness of the lake water hinted at pollution.
meanings.sent5: The fishiness of the fish market lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being suspicious or questionable.
meanings.sent1: There was a sense of fishiness in his story that made me doubt its truth.
meanings.sent2: The fishiness of the deal made me hesitant to proceed.
meanings.sent3: The fishiness of the excuse raised eyebrows among the group.
meanings.sent4: The fishiness of the situation was too obvious to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The fishiness of his behavior was a red flag for the detectives.
